src:
Gempa M 2,9 Terjadi Mamasa Sulbar
07 Nov 2019, 05:28 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Gempa bermagnitudo 2,9 terjadi di Kabupaten Mamasa, Sulawesi Barat. Pusat gempa berada di darat.
Dilihat dari situs resmi BMKG, Kamis (7/11/2019), gempa tersebut terjadi sekitar pukul 04.20 WIB.
"Pusat gempa berada di darat 19 Km Timur kecamatan Tabulaha, kabupaten Mamasa," tulis BMKG.
Gempa terjadi pada kedalaman 10 km. Pusat gempa berada pada koordinat 2,70 Lintang Selatan (LS) dan 119,39 Bujur Timur.
Gempa dirasakan dalam Skala MMI (Modified Mercalli Intensity) II di Mamasa. Skala ini berarti getaran dirasakan oleh beberapa orang, benda-benda ringan yang digantung bergoyang.
Belum ada informasi ada atau tidaknya kerusakan akibat getaran gempa tersebut.




(dwia/fdu)
text:
M Quake 2.9 Occurs in Mamasa Sulbar
Nov 7 2019, 05:28 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - The 2.9 magnitude earthquake occurred in Mamasa Regency, West Sulawesi. The epicenter was on land.
Judging from the official website of BMKG, Thursday (11/07/2019), the earthquake occurred around 04.20 WIB.
"The epicenter was on land 19 km east of Tabulaha sub-district, Mamasa district," BMKG wrote.
The earthquake occurred at a depth of 10 km. The epicenter was at coordinates 2.70 south latitude (LS) and 119.39 east longitude.
The earthquake was felt on the MMI (Modified Mercalli Intensity) II scale in Mamasa. This scale means that vibrations are felt by some people, light objects that are hung swaying.
There is no information yet whether or not the damage caused by the earthquake vibration.




(dwia / fdu)
